question: I haven't had a normal Menstrual cycle for like 5 years. I have gain almost 100lbs. i am at my heaviest weight and im only 5'2.. Two years ago I went in and talked to my doctors I did an ultra sound and she said  I had multiple polyps. They just confirmed I had PCOS.  They put me on Metiformn its a treatment that they give to Diabetes paients.  But 2 years later and im still overweight, i have ache that wont go away.. and I dont have normal periods if any at all... should I be concerned more? should i seek another opinion on this?  i just hate being this big. its embarrassing. i dont know what 2 do.  im real worried because problems with ovaries in my family run high. my mother just had to have her right side removed because it was cancerous.   should i be asking for surgery?
title: Is this something that will just go away?
